    • Constructor Detail

      • BatfishObjectMapper

        public BatfishObjectMapper()

    • Method Detail

      • mapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper mapper()
        Returns a ObjectMapper configured to Batfish JSON standards. The JSON produced is not pretty-printed; see prettyWriter() for that. It also doesn't include null values and empty lists; see ALWAYS_WRITER for that. If you want both features, use verboseMapper().

      • clone

        public static <T> T clone(java.lang.Object o,
                          java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Uses Jackson to clone the given object using the given type.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • clone

        public static <T> T clone(java.lang.Object o,
                          com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference<T> type)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        Uses Jackson to clone the given object using the given type.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • writer

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter writer()
        Returns a ObjectWriter configured to Batfish JSON standards. The JSON produced is not pretty-printed; see prettyWriter() for that.

      • prettyWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter prettyWriter()
        Returns a ObjectWriter configured to Batfish JSON standards. The JSON produced is not pretty-printed; for a more concise encoding use writer().

      • verboseMapper

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper verboseMapper()
        Returns a ObjectMapper configured to Batfish JSON standards. Relative to mapper(), it indents the JSON and includes null values and empty lists.

      • verboseWriter

        public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectWriter verboseWriter()
        Returns a ObjectWriter configured to Batfish JSON standards. The JSON produced is verbosely pretty-printed; all fields are included.
        See Also:
        writer(), prettyWriter()

      • writeStringWithNulls

        public static java.lang.String writeStringWithNulls(java.lang.Object o)
                                             throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Returns a JSON string representation of the given object with nulls and empties included.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

      • writeString

        public static java.lang.String writeString(java.lang.Object o)
                                    throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Returns a concise JSON string representation of the given object.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException

      • writePrettyString

        public static java.lang.String writePrettyString(java.lang.Object o)
                                          throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
        Returns a pretty JSON string representation of the given object.
        Throws:
        com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
